feature_description: Integrate Twitter/X feeds into SIGINT dashboard using hybrid approach: list-based baseline monitoring (curated AI/ML accounts like @AnthropicAI, @OpenAI, @ylecun) with event-driven search on narrative spikes. Implement deep narrative correlation engine that matches tweet velocity and hashtag spikes with news headlines to detect leading indicators and amplification patterns. Pilot with AI/ML category. Must respect free tier API limits (1500 reads/month) with aggressive S3 caching. Create twitter_client.py, correlation_engine.py, twitter Lambda handler. Add TweetItem and CorrelatedNarrative models. Integrate with existing narrative detection system.
